text:
ANM is the main operator
of mobility services
in the city of Naples

and, in addition to managing
one subway line, soon two,
it manages 4 funicular lines

and about 13 million km
of surface buses.

In addition, it manages
about 25,000 street parking spaces.
This was indeed the production line

that we focused
on first with Municipia

and then with the complete
migration of platforms on the Cloud
to, first of all, simplify the tasks

the citizens need
to complete to apply for permits.

We're talking about
around 20,000 applications each year
that we need to deal with,

along with approximately
100,000 applications
for access to the ZTL
that are handled by the company.

We started from a manual
treatment modality on paper
and now we are completely digital.

This was made possible by
the INES Cloud platform by Municipia,

which then relied
on Cloud systems offered by AWS,
providing great added values.

The first of which is flexibility
in the size of the spaces
of data storage,

which are hardly guaranteed
internally by the company,

and then addressing
an external subject who is able,

with great speed,
to adjust the storage spaces
according to business needs,

which for us was
the first great benefit.

The second one is connected
to data security,
a topic that is

absolutely fundamental
for transport companies
and that, with qualified partners,

manages to guarantee
absolutely adequate levels
to the current needs

of protection for both Cyber attacks
and for the protection of privacy.

We, as a transport company,
are impacted by

or better, we are crossed
by a huge data stream.

This data stream
is not only related to
the parking production line,

but also, above all,
that of our passengers' movements.

We carry
about 50 million people every year,

and these 50 million people
every year

transmit to us a series
of data and information.

This data and information
is of great added value,
that, with the collaboration

between us and individuals
who are able to develop

also artificial
intelligence solutions,

we can edit
our production processes

to bestow on them
a great added value.
